name: Gaoping Shouyang Coal Mine

The Gaoping Shouyang Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Dongshayuan, Shennong Town, Gaoping City, Jinzhong, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Shouyang Coal Industry Company
owners: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Shouyang Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated and owned by Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Shouyang Coal Industry Company.
